name: Air Plan
description:
You saw a vision. It's 48 seconds into the future.
You saw tragedy. But you couldn't prevent it.
You snapped back to yourself. You got 48 seconds to stop the tragedy in the future.
You wondered to yourself, how many visions will you see, before you can prevent the tragedy?

This is a puzzle game where you have to lose over and over again to gain clues and overturn your fate!

Credits:
Music:
NoTec by Ingmar Matthis
Overchill by Lobo Loco
Adagio by Dee Yan-Key
Sound Effects:
CC0 Content from freesound.org
Game Engine: Godot
Art/Programming/Designing: Cocoon (Me!)

Currently Known Bugs:
- The tutorial got one extra blank screen.
- Toilet gets reset every time player reenters it.
- The Hatch's sound doesn't match the different stages.
- If you found any more bugs, comment them below! I will be re-releasing this game as a full game, with a lot more endings!
- If you encounter any game-breaking bugs, try to go back to home. If that failed, restart the game. And of course, comment them here so I can fix them!

Have a great day, and have fun playing!
- Cocoon
